doc.title: CalDAV

value.content: CalDAV (Calendaring extensions to WebDAV) is a protocol standardized by the IETF and used to remotely access calendar data from a server.

value.title: See also
value.content:
• CalDAV on Wikipedia
  • RFC 4791: Calendaring extensions to WebDAV (CalDAV)
  • RFC 6638: Scheduling Extensions to CalDAV

doc.summary: CalDAV (Calendaring extensions to WebDAV) is a protocol standardized by the IETF and used to remotely access calendar data from a server.
